src_original: nityaṃ svasamayaḥ sādhyo nityaṃ pūjyās tathāgatāḥ /
nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hy asau // 390
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yad asmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ /  samāḥ samayadevānāṃ bhavitā stha na saṃśayaḥ // 392
adyābhiṣiktā āyuṣmantaḥ sarvabuddhaiḥ savajribhiḥ /  traidhātukamahārājyaṃ rājādhipatayaḥ sthirāḥ / 393
